org.springdata.cassandra.convert
Class MappingCassandraConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.springdata.cassandra.convert.AbstractCassandraConverter
      org.springdata.cassandra.convert.MappingCassandraConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
CassandraConverter, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanClassLoaderAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.data.convert.EntityConverter<CassandraPersistentEntity<?>,CassandraPersistentProperty,Object,Object>, org.springframework.data.convert.EntityReader<Object,Object>, org.springframework.data.convert.EntityWriter<Object,Object>
public class MappingCassandraConverter
extends AbstractCassandraConverter
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanClassLoaderAware

CassandraConverter that uses a MappingContext to do sophisticated mapping of domain objects to Row.

Author:
Alex Shvid
